PageWidgetPortable.Title: Relatórios disponíveis
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_R_RELATORIOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.EMISSAOWEB = 'S' AND (A.HANDLE IN (SELECT RELATORIO FROM R_TAREFARELATORIOS WHERE TAREFA IN @TAREFAS) OR @PAPEL = (SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_PAPEIS WHERE NOME = 'W_DESENVOLVEDOR')) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
